<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Limited">
[Putrefy Food and Drink](/Spells.aspx?ID=823)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #158: Sixty Feet Under](/Sources.aspx?ID=47) pg. 77

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 cubic foot of clean food or water
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You cause otherwise edible food to rot and spoil instantly, and water and other liquids to become brackish and undrinkable. [_Holy water_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=245), [_unholy water_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=248), and similar food and drink of significance are spoiled by this spell, unless they are associated with a deity of decay or putrefaction, but it has no effect on creatures of any type, [potions](/Equipment.aspx?Category=15&Subcategory=18), or [alchemical elixirs](/Equipment.aspx?Category=6&Subcategory=8). One cubic foot of liquid is roughly 8 gallons.

---
**Heightened (2nd)** You can target an alchemical elixir with this spell, attempting a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check against it. If you succeed, the elixir spoils and becomes a mundane item.

**Heightened (3rd)** You can target a potion or alchemical elixir with this spell, attempting a counteract check against it. If you succeed, the elixir or potion spoils and becomes a mundane item.
name: Putrefy Food and Drink
